title: Between Sujood Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Between Sujood Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Between Sujood Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 48
items.translation: My Lord forgive me, My Lord forgive me.

items.title: Dua 49
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي)).
items.translation: Ali Ibn Abee Talib  related that he heard the Messenger of Allah  say: ‘If a man calls on his sick Muslim brother, it is as if he walks reaping the fruits of Paradise until he sits, and when he sits he is showered in mercy, and if this was in the morning, seventy thousand angles send prayers upon him until the evening, and if this was in the evening, seventy thousand angles send prayers upon him until the morning.
